#summary How to install Hudson
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

[http://hudson-ci.org/ Hudson] is extensible continuous integration server.

= Prerequisites =

Configured repository (see [HowTo]).

= Installation =

If you use paludis:
{{{
paludis -i dev-util/hudson-bin
}}}

Or using emerge:
{{{
emerge -av dev-util/hudson-bin
}}}

Now you can configure Hudson:
{{{
/etc/conf.d/hudson
}}}

The only thing left to do is to start:
{{{
/etc/init.d/hudson start
}}}

And, optionally, add it to start at boot:
{{{
rc-update add hudson default
}}}
